description: tankard, shallow domed lid and modified ball thumbpiece set on stem, truncated convex base with decorated geometric band in wriggled work, drum ornamentated with leaf sprays and, in front, a set of tools

on top of lid: [K.W. Schlagel]
markings:

title: Tankard
